name: WAIFU WARS ONLINE
detailed_description:
WAIFU, or Weaponized AI Field Units, were created by the special weapons group TAKAMI Corporation Co., Ltd. as a result of the WAIFU Defense Force program. TAKAMI provides state-of-the-art tactical solutions to military institutions, facilitating generalized combat operations and interplanetary resource extraction.

Features

  • Pure Gameplay - Gameplay first design across 41+ maps
  • Action RPG - Choose from 10+ stats/skills and 1000+ weapon combinations to create your own playstyle
  • Customization - Customize a beautiful W.A.I.F.U. and choose from first or third person view
  • Dedicated Servers

Game Modes

  • Survival
  • PVP Deathmatch
  • Dungeon Crawling / Mission Mode

short_description: Kill, loot, and level up with other players in this mysterious online realm. Welcome to WAIFU WARS ONLINE!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10+
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
